source_documents.type: Virginia Giuffre v. Alan Dershowitz complaint

virginia_giuffre.escaped: September 2002 - fled to Australia from Thailand

courtney_wild.legal_action: Suing federal government over CVRA violations

maria_farmer.allegations: Sexually assaulted by Epstein and Maxwell

haley_robson.role: Integral player in Epstein's Florida scheme

new_entities_discovered.name: Virginia Giuffre
new_entities_discovered.role: Primary Epstein accuser. Trafficked 2000-2002 starting age 15. Recruited by Maxwell at Mar-a-Lago. Filed suit against Dershowitz, Prince Andrew. Fled to Australia 2002.

new_entities_discovered.name: Courtney Wild
new_entities_discovered.role: FBI-identified victim. Brought 60+ girls to Epstein's Palm Beach estate. Filed CVRA lawsuit against federal government.

new_entities_discovered.name: Sarah Ransome
new_entities_discovered.role: Epstein accuser. Provided sworn testimony. Alleged she was recruited and trafficked. Now lives in Barcelona.

new_entities_discovered.name: Maria Farmer
new_entities_discovered.role: Epstein employee who was sexually assaulted by Epstein and Maxwell. Provided sworn testimony. Worked 'manning the front desk'.

new_entities_discovered.name: Chauntae Davies
new_entities_discovered.role: Epstein victim who showed photos of Clinton's visits with Epstein.

new_entities_discovered.name: Haley Robson
new_entities_discovered.role: Recruiter for Epstein. 18-20 year old Palm Beach student paid $200 per underage girl brought to Epstein. 'Integral player in Epstein's Florida scheme'.
